author: maverick lesmana
comment: i love it, best ui. and i would like to ask for freedom custom color optional for the background and the font and also option to dismiss the outer ring of the watchface so the ui much wider..pleeeeeease 🙏
title: love & improvement

author: Bigs73
comment: One of my faves.   Love the digital look.   One slight weather sync issue,  it goes blank sometimes even with always connected and no optimization.
title: Love it!

author: Omar G
comment: I really enjoy this watch face. I always find myself going back to using this one. It has a retro look and clean face. Works fine and is quick to display. No issues with notifications or apps. Android wear slide functions work fluidly. Great work! Makes the Android wear experience great.
title: One of the best!

author: Alexander Gomez
comment: It's very hard to read notifications on this watch face since they won't go opaque in Moto 360. I've reported this issue to the developer, no fix was provided.
title: Preview card won't go opaque Moto 360

author: Ga Ri
comment: One of my favorite faces now thanks to the battery improvement. I prefer the black and white mode.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Could you please tell us about your situation more in detail.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Moto 360 1st gen

author: Cristi Belciug
comment: Can you provide an option from where can be choosen what element to be displayed in ambient mode?
title: Very nice

author: Erik Bosman
comment: Best 'LCD' I have seen so far!
title: Nice

author: bumpy blood
comment: This is one of my top 3!!
title: Great app

author: jia dongdong
comment: Just recently, when there is any notification, the panel color will become black and white (less than 1s), then becomes the color I choosen. Hope can fix it  in future
title: Blinking recently

author: kingjah2gz
comment: Love the watch face. However, it is a serious battery killer. Please fix asap.
title: Serious battery killer.

author: Marcos Gutierrez Alves
comment: Best watchface I ever seen, but the battery drain is 2 or 3 times more than a regular face, even with minimal settings. I hope the developers fix this issue soon...
title: Impressive watchface, however, the battery consumption is massive!

author: MoMo Wang
comment: make my watch energy empty in 5 hours
title: too waste electricity

author: Scott Pikula
comment: This is very nice looking on the Moto 360! Love it! Well worth the money!
title: Beautiful watch faces

author: steven zheng
comment: Nice and works really good, likes given a good choice of the round sharp watch.
title: Absolutely good

author: Todd Teifer
comment: Love the face. However my battery drains real fast.
title: OK. Battery Drain

author: Don C
comment: The words on the top and the side are just a bit misaligned.  The are pushed off the edge a few pixels to many. I guess its ok but it looks funky under the beveled glass on the moto 360. The text for the year/week, the last digit under the week gets real close to the edge, too close. I think it's touching.  Check your spacing.  been wanting a option from you to do this. [Change colors] Still would like to see it on A06 watchface, I think that one looks way better than this one.  but ill take this for now.
title: Best digital watch maker in the play store.

author: bryson oneill
comment: Great face; however, I believe that it could be improved by removing the gray bar around the sides, much like the A06 watch face. If we could have an A06 Watch Face with the details such as temp, battery percentage of the phone, and overall theme (minus gray bar) it would be perfect!
title: Great, but needs something

author: Victor Miranda
comment: This watchface is perfect. Changing colors is awesome.
title: Beautiful
